sn35.115:4.1: “Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.115:4.2: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati—
sn35.115:4.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu baddho cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu, āvāsagato mārassa, mārassa vasaṃ gato, paṭimukkassa mārapāso.
sn35.115:4.4: Baddho so mārabandhanena yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato … pe ….
sn35.115:5.2: santi, bhikkhave, manoviññeyyā dhammā, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.115:5.3: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati—
sn35.115:5.4: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu baddho manoviññeyyesu dhammesu, āvāsagato mārassa, mārassa vasaṃ gato, paṭimukkassa mārapāso.
sn35.115:5.5: Baddho so mārabandhanena yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato … pe ….
sn35.115:6.1: Santi ca kho, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.115:6.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati—
sn35.115:6.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mutto cakkhuviññeyyehi rūpehi, nāvāsagato mārassa, na mārassa vasaṃ gato, ummukkassa mārapāso.
sn35.115:6.4: Mutto so mārabandhanena na yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato … pe ….
sn35.115:7.2: santi, bhikkhave, manoviññeyyā dhammā, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.115:7.3: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati—
sn35.115:7.4: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mutto manoviññeyyehi dhammehi, nāvāsagato mārassa, na mārassa vasaṃ gato, ummukkassa mārapāso.
sn35.115:7.5: Mutto so mārabandhanena na yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato”ti.
